Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: We were here for breakfast and when my colleagues got their food I was also looking forward to mine. For 7.5 euros it was simply inedible and very uncharitably arranged. Have eaten in Amsterdam for the same price much better.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: It was good to have a meeting before lunch time. The service was good and also the food

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: We often call in the Bruincaf√© 't Centrum when we visit Amsterdam. Not for any other reason than we went on our first ever trip and we really enjoyed sitting in the bar with a drink and a plate of bar nibbles...so why go anywhere else. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text:
We had a nice beer browered in Amsterdam (Browerij' T ij) with the Dutch bitterballen. The terrace is heated and a plaid provided.
The price is reasonable (16‚Ç¨) for a beautiful terrace located in the center of Amsterdam

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Great location, nice place, good food and nice staff. We all got pancakes that morning, but we asked for extra bacon because some of us had very little bacon in the plate. Had a good experience overall üòÄ

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text:
Be careful with this place.
The prices on the draught beers menu are per half pint. So basically if you order a pint that would cost around ‚Ç¨9! Probably the most expensive beer in Europe.
Even if that was the case the waiting staff should have advised the client.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Good service, food good, price average

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Nice coffee and food, great value for money and nice and helpful staff.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Lovely cafe with a nice breakfast and friendly staff. Lovely pancakes

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: A lovely cup of coffee and a great place to sit, relax and watch the world go by.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Great place, great location, nice staff

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Quick service, nice atmosphere. Good place to hide from the cold rain. They don't chase you away as soon as your plate is empty which makes it perfect to hang out with friends.  Overall, great bar

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Open for everyone, with a jab or without it. Friendly staff.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Went here for breakfast. Took like forever to get any attention from the waiter and even longer to get what we ordered. Coffee arrived pretty quick, though. Americano from capsule, probably, with no soul. When the food finally arrived, it ‚Ä¶

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Been visiting here since I was a student in the 80's and no trip to Amsterdam goes by without dropping in on the Centrum for some bitterballen, beers and watching the people go by. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Unfortunately at this very touristic places quality and courtesy are not up to modern standards. Dirty tables glasses and cutlery long wait, very small options in the menu, high prices. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Gorgeous, filling breakfast. Freshly squeezed orange juice was "the best 3 euro I ever spent!" Lovely service. Will return!

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Great for a quick bite to eat! Also for a full meal , good choice, fantastic old world type " pub " in Amsterdam centre, friendly staff, also seating outside.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Great place for lunch and a drink. Large selection of beers. Not too expensive and has a nice outside seating area with view on the Rembrandt square

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Very nice place to have breakfast ouside, watching all the people passing by. We enjoyed omelettes, Aperol-Spritz, very delicious... Good service.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Great location and service, good beer I can't judge anything more.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Found this little gem on our last day in Amsterdam, wish we found it sooner. Great value breakfast in a big portion served by friendly staff.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Another typical bar on the square. Couldn't say the staff were friendly neither were they rude. They were almost robot-like. It wasn't a negative experience and nor was it special. Average.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text:
Me: can I have a cheese burger plz!

After half an hour, I asked about my burger. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Friendly staff great vegetarian omelette and coffee

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Really cool place, so old and just a great vibe. I love places like this, it makes me feel like I'm in a different age. I can't wait to go back!

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Good place for beers or wine, no food (apart from croquetes or cheesy sticks which both are great). Nice service.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Really friendly approachable staff, and the breakfast I had was so delicious, also invited to watch the football later that evening

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Fine terrace in the sun, friendly stuff, good price, tasty "bitterballen" - the Dutch special. And a lovely cat that doesn't bother anyone.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Service is really friendly and quick. Must try their pancakes, but even their toasties although quite simple are really delicious as well.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: One of my favourite coffees in town! Small & cozy... friendly staff & good service

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Standard breakfast fare in the open air on the square, but the freshly squeezed orange juice is outstanding

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: A true highlight in Rembrandtplein! This is a great Bruincafe, and offers a perfect venue to grab a beer and enjoy the sights.

Name: Bruin Cafe 't Centrum
Review Text: Had Amstel draft beer and bitterballen. Good friendly service. Great location
